name: Bone Ringer
flavorText: When this bell tolls, the dead will always answer.
flavorTextHtml: When this bell tolls, the dead will always answer.

primary.textHtml: Critical Hit Chance Increased by [8.0 - 10.0]%

secondary.textHtml: The damage bonus of Command Skeletons increases by 27% per second they spend attacking the same target. This effect stacks up to 60 times. (Necromancer Only) [25 - 30]%
secondary.text: The damage bonus of Command Skeletons increases by 27% per second they spend attacking the same target. This effect stacks up to 60 times. (Necromancer Only) [25 - 30]%
